text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) affaan-m/everything-claude-code | 97% | stars now 34936 → est 62407 (range 62290-62524)
   https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code
2) lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid | 96% | stars now 2933 → est 19847 (range 19822-19872)
   https://github.com/lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid
3) cloudflare/moltworker | 94% | stars now 1886 → est 8126 (range 8101-8151)
   https://github.com/cloudflare/moltworker
4) VoltAgent/awesome-moltbot-skills | 94% | stars now 3749 → est 10960 (range 10932-10988)
   https://github.com/VoltAgent/awesome-moltbot-skills
5) deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-OCR-2 | 93% | stars now 1639 → est 6476 (range 6451-6501)
   https://github.com/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-OCR-2

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
